songs.title: Knocc Em Off
songs.lyrics:
Pow Pow Pow Pow Pow
Pow Pow Pow Pow Pow

I got big toys
Like AK’s
The whole block scatter
When they spray
Who want war
Who want beef
My grown heat
Will add a grease
To your corn piece

Burn shit so much
That you can smell a toast
I’m from Compton
My neighborhood is bellicose
I’m a heavy weight
You’re a feather weight
They could fling you
Watch your body levitate

Never hesitate
When I aim that
If I pull it
Believe that
I’m gonna
Bang that
The white T that you’re wearing
I’m gonna stain that
And leave bullet holes
And cracks
Where your frame at

Rearrange that
Cause you a lame cat
Come through and catch bodies
Where your gang at
Where you claim that
Cause you cotton soft

Busted niggas catch em sniffing
Till we knocc em off
Pow Pow knocc em off
Pow Pow knocc em off

Busted kniggas catch em sniffing
Then we knocc em off

Pow Pow knocc em off
Pow Pow knocc em off
Busted kniggas catch em sniffing
Then we knocc em off

Pow Pow knocc em off
Pow Pow knocc em off
Busted kniggas catch em sniffing
Then we knocc em off

Pow Pow knocc em off
Pow Pow knocc em off

Damn I know all about
Guerilla warfare
Bagdhad
You’d think I did a tour there
I’m a warrior
Mujanhe
Now it’s disabil allow

When I pop shit
When you catch a body
You do it for applause
Yeah
When I catch a body
I do it for a cause
Yeah
I don’t trust niggas
Not no buff niggas
Scope on the rifle
30 odd  snuffed niggas


You’re an actor
You wanna be tough niggas
I play poker
I’m quick to call your bluff
Nigga
Get your body guard
That buff nigga
Watch my 50 cal
Lift him out his truck
Nigga

God only
I fear no man
Eye for an eye
It’s in the Quran
At the lips
These niggas just be popping off
Busted niggas
Catch em sniffing
Then we knocc em off

Pow Pow knocc em off
Pow Pow knocc em off
Busted niggas
Catch em sniffing
Then we knocc em off

Pow Pow knocc em off
Pow Pow knocc em off

Busted niggas
Catch em sniffing
Then we knocc em off

Pow Pow knocc em off
Pow Pow knocc em off
Busted niggas
Catch em sniffing
Then we knocc em off

Pow Pow knocc em off
Pow Pow knocc em off
Busted niggas
Catch em sniffing
Then we knocc em off

Yeah
That’s what we do to bitch niggas
Niggas you know how it is
Y’all know it
If I catch you slipping niggas
I’m gonna knocc you off
Old bitch ass niggas
I can’t stand a bitch ass niggas
OOh. Where the fuck my gun at
